thread.section_title: Wheelbasealloys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wheelbasealloys | www.wheelbasealloys.com
thread.title: Nicholas Ruskin

author: Nicholas Ruskin
title: Nicholas Ruskin
text: I was advised by a race engine specialist to "go to Wheelbase as they really knew their stuff" - I wasn't disappointed - wanted slightly wider tyres on the back wheels which they were able to order and sort for me via email - they provided lots of good helpful support and clearly care that the customer ends up with exactly what they want - wheels and tyres turned up well packaged and look amazing on the car - thoroughly recommended service
